entry.title: Fentanyl Crisis Fed by Flow of Chinese Chemicals to Mexican Drug Cartels
entry.content: Strains in U.S.-China relations have ended Beijing’s cooperation in restricting chemicals that are key ingredients for making the deadly drug.

entry.title: As India Leaves Covid Behind, Families Say Their Dead Weren't Counted
entry.content: Some people say their loved ones died from the disease but they lack the documentation to prove it.

entry.title: Russia Blames Ukraine for Attack on Leaders Deep in Occupied Territory
entry.content: Explosions killed two people in Russian-held areas of eastern Ukraine and injured at least two prominent figures in what appears to show Kyiv’s ability to gather intelligence behind enemy lines.

entry.title: Russia's Draft Patched Holes but Also Exposed Flaws in War Machine
entry.content: Soldiers mobilized to fight in Ukraine say inadequate training, alcohol abuse and faulty equipment abound.
